stories.text:
What are good resources to learn basics of hydrodynamics?

I remember few weeks ago stumbling upon on a blog post here on HN explaining the basics but I couldn't find it again.

Anyone knows what was a blog post and can anyone share additional resources?
stories.title: Ask HN: Introduction to Hydrodynamics?
The Surprising Benefits of Talking to Strangers

stories.text:
Colon Detox Plus has been taken by a great many people with no announced incidental effects. In contrast to poisonous drugs, everything inside Colon Detox Plus is normal. You may encounter a few evenings where you would prefer not to rest when your energy levels take off through the rooftop! What's more, you may have companions hassling you and asking what you've been up to look so great… however we trust those are minor inconveniences.

https://scamlegit.com/colon-detox-plus-review/

https://www.facebook.com/letsfindtoday/posts/991328225057953
